hero.title: Kranthi's Portfolio
hero.description: AI & Data Engineer with experience building scalable ETL pipelines, NLP systems, LLM-powered workflows, and cloud-native machine learning infrastructure. Skilled in Python, PySpark, AWS, and developing intelligent data-driven applications.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I’m Kranthi Pedamajji, an AI & Data Engineer specializing in building scalable data pipelines, NLP systems, and production-ready machine learning workflows. My expertise includes Python, PySpark, cloud-based ETL pipelines, and designing AI-driven solutions across structured and unstructured data.

At Quanti LLC, I engineered multi-platform ingestion frameworks and a full NLP enrichment pipeline—including translation, sentiment scoring, SBERT relevance modeling, and entity extraction—to support analytics and automation. I also built backend services and AWS-based workflows supporting large-scale processing.

Previously at CitiusTech (WellSky), I designed and optimized enterprise-grade ETL pipelines using Python, SQL, and PySpark to process healthcare datasets from HL7, FHIR, APIs, and clinical systems. I also implemented data quality frameworks, metadata tracking, and containerized pipelines.

With a Master’s in Data Science from Rowan University, I bring strong experience in machine learning, NLP, and cloud technologies. I’m passionate about building AI systems that combine robust engineering with scalable ML capabilities.

jobs.description: Engineered large-scale multi-platform ETL pipelines, built a complete NLP enrichment engine (translation, sentiment scoring, SBERT relevance, entity extraction), and deployed cloud-native data services on AWS. Developed FastAPI services powering analytics dashboards and LLM-driven features.

Designed and optimized enterprise healthcare ETL pipelines using Python, SQL, and PySpark. Processed HL7/FHIR datasets, built metadata-driven workflows, implemented data quality frameworks, and containerized pipelines using Docker and Azure CI/CD.

Built foundational ETL workflows, developed preprocessing modules for NLP systems, experimented with ML models using scikit-learn and TensorFlow/PyTorch, and contributed to early AI prototypes involving embeddings and classification pipelines.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of my recent work.

items.title: NLP-Powered ETL Enrichment Pipeline
items.description: Designed a production-grade NLP pipeline for multilingual comment processing, including translation, sentiment scoring, SBERT relevance, lemmatization, and entity extraction. Integrated into a scalable ETL system producing analytics-ready datasets.
items.technologies: NLP, Python, SBERT, NLTK, spaCy, ETL, AWS

items.title: Distributed Social Media Data Aggregation Pipeline
items.description: Implemented a distributed ETL ingestion pipeline using OAuth to extract large-scale data from multiple social platforms, supporting analytics, LLM fine-tuning, and sentiment modeling.
items.technologies: Python, ETL, OAuth, AWS Lambda, PostgreSQL

items.title: Big Data Analytics Project
items.description: Built a scalable big data processing solution using Apache Cassandra, focusing on distributed data management, data modeling, and high-availability analytics.
items.technologies: Apache Cassandra, NoSQL, Data Modeling, Tableau, Python

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hi? Reach out via email, phone, or connect with me on social media.
